long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Facebook Marketplace Auto Reply Extension

Effortlessly manage your Facebook Marketplace inquiries with our powerful auto-reply extension, powered by ChatGPT. Save time and engage customers instantly with AI-generated responses that feel human.

Key Features:
- Automatically answer common questions about your listings
- Include contact details, website links, and more in replies
- Handle thousands of messages monthly
- Personalized responses for each listing
- Ask customers for their details to streamline follow-ups

Why Choose Us:
- Quick setup and easy integration with your Facebook account
- Free trial to experience the benefits firsthand
- Highly rated by users for improving customer interaction and saving time

Start for free today and transform how you manage Marketplace messages! 

Download Now and Boost Your Productivity!
